column2: "<%me>...where are we?"
"Well, well, those are some nostalgic faces there."
"That voice...!"
"For us to unexpectedly meet here... is what I should say?"
"Luther!"
"Whoa, would you desist? I didn't come here to fight with you guys."
"1. Where is this?"
"2. How are you alive?"
"Shouldn't you know without asking? This is the inside of [Double]'s stomach. The inner universe of the Dark Falz."
"You and I, we've been eaten. By Dark Falz [Double], that is."
"Haha, an interesting question. Can you call this situation to be truly alive?"
"This is [Double]'s inner universe. You and I, we've been eaten and thus we're in their stomach."
"Well, I'm not all that dissatisfied. The things you experience inside of a Dark Falz aren't so easily found elsewhere."
"Once you get used to it, it's pretty fun."
"Also, I have no more interest in the outside. A world without Xion... without omniscience... is one I've no interest in."
"Understand, my lady? I no longer have a reason to antagonize you. So, can you lower your weapon?"
"Thank you. Now that we've calmed down, let me accompany you."
"This place is a bit dangerous, but quite interesting. It's a rare opportunity, so allow me to guide you."
"-Best Worst Last Toys-"
"出来損ないの最高傑作"
